cells.data: I am now at home. I am laid out in the living room on our couch that was put out into a bed. I will not be able to walk on my right leg for three months. They found blood clots in my legs and in my lungs. I am on 24-hour oxygen, and blood thinners as well as lots of pain killers. I can do nothing for myself. My wife is working from home for the forseeable future.
